# Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

# Load dataset

```{r}
# Load the data using readxl library and remove missing values present in different formats

radiation <- read_xlsx(path = "~/group_18_project/_raw/radiation_dataset.xlsx", na = c("unknown", "Unknown", "N/A", "Unkown", "unkown", "" ))
```
